import{createStore}from'redux';import{persistReducer}from'redux-persist';import{combineReducers}from'redux';//Module to combine all of the reducers in our reducers folder.
import storage from'redux-persist/lib/storage';import counterReducer from'../reducers/counterReducer';import userReducer from'../reducers/userReducer';import themeReducer from'../reducers/themeReducer';var persistConfig={key:'root',storage:storage};var myReducers=combineReducers({counterReducer:counterReducer,userReducer:userReducer,themeReducer:themeReducer});var persistedReducers=persistReducer(persistConfig,myReducers);var store=createStore(persistedReducers);export default store;
